entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
